message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $100 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from $130. I'd be willing to go up to $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $115. I'm willing to compromise at $125. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not willing to go above $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
